projectGridLines.title: Growth and Strategy Intern
projectGridLines.description:
The Growth and Strategy Intern will assist in building and nurturing key

partnerships to drive the company's growth. They will support the development of

strategic relationships, coordinate with internal teams to align partnership goals with

company objectives, and represent the company at industry events. Additionally, they will

conduct market research to identify partnership opportunities and trends, analyze data to

inform strategic decisions, and contribute to developing innovative growth strategies. This

role offers a comprehensive learning experience in managing partnerships, negotiating

deals, and utilizing market insights to drive growth.

Skill sets: Business development, market research, Marketing,
